text: Quentin Lee Pongia (9 July 1970 â€“ 18 May 2019) was a New Zealand rugby league player. He played as a prop. He played for the Canberra Raiders, Auckland Warriors, Sydney Roosters, St George Illawarra Dragons and Wigan Warriors. He also played for the New Zealand national team between 1992 and 2000. He was from the West Coast, South Island. Pongia died of bowel cancer on 18 May 2019 in Greymouth, West Coast. He was 48. ==References== ==Other websites== *Quentin Pongia at Rugby League Project Category:1970 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from colorectal cancer Category:Cancer deaths in New Zealand Category:New Zealand rugby league players Category:People from South Island Category:West Coast Region
title: Quentin Pongia
